column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It's a bit noisy and I'm not completely happy with group seating
column2: but they do have a few booths and tables so occasionally we'll get lucky and end up sitting at one of those (without specifying we want to sit there
column3: never asked but I'm assuming the wait time adds up for specific seating). I should also add that for the most part it's always busy and poppin
column4: so expect to wait- it could be less than 10 minutes or maybe up to 30..
